alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 8:48PM MDT until June 08 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... South central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 847 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Aurora, or 6 miles southeast of Denver, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Large amounts of hail up to Half dollar size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Hail may accumulate on roadways causing hazardous travel. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Denver, Aurora, eastern Centennial, Greenwood Village, Watkins, Buckley SFB and Arapahoe Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
